name: rx-postmessenger
author: Jeffrey Westerkamp
description: Minimal RxJS wrapper around the window.postMessage interface for both passive (request-response) and active (notification) streams across frame windows.

scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm publish --access=public && git push
